translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「らしい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それも昔の話で、今は縁も切れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's from long ago, and now the ties have been cut.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があったかは知らんがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know what happened."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統はJAPANにいたこともあるそうだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I heard the commander was once in JAPAN,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀を使う巫女は見たことなかったろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you never saw a shrine maiden using a sword, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what it means."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、それで終われば良かったんだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it would have been fine if it ended there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が家自体は剣術家として残り続けてな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but my family itself continued on as swordsmen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「母は幼き頃に死去……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My mother died when I was very young...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の私まで父や兄達のもと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even I, a girl, was under my father and brothers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幼き頃より剣術を叩き込まれた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was drilled in swordsmanship from a young age."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「日々、剣術剣術剣術のイカれた家だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was a crazy household obsessed with swordsmanship every single day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、なんかキツそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmm, sounds pretty harsh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、キツかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, it was tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色恋やお洒落とは無縁の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With no connection to romance or fashion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汗と血反吐にまみれる修行の日々――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was days of training soaked in sweat and blood and vomit—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「が、ある日すごく嫌になって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But one day I really got fed up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父も兄も皆殺しにしてやった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I killed my father and brothers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええー……」
「だって、家を出てくと言ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because when I said I was leaving the house,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らの屍を乗り越えろって言うから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they told me to step over our corpses."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、戦いは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, in the fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父と九人の兄対私の十対一だったんだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was my father and nine brothers against me—ten to one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それ、どうやって勝ったんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How did you manage to win that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一服盛った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I poisoned them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええー……」
「だって、うちの家訓は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because our family motto is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汚くとも勝て、だから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Win no matter how dirty it is.'"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝つためならなんでもやりたい放題、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We did whatever we wanted to win,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当、イカれた家だったんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: really, it was a crazy family."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、家を出たはいいが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So it was fine that I left the house, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局剣の道で生きるしかなくてな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in the end, I had no choice but to live by the way of the sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 用心棒として糊口をしのぐ生活だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I lived making ends meet as a bodyguard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなときに出会ったのが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At such a time, I met

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警護対象となった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the person I was assigned to protect,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな商家の息子である今の旦那だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the son of a large merchant family—my current husband."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俗に言う一目惚れでな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was what you'd call love at first sight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は一発で夢中になった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was instantly captivated."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、相手には良家とのご縁が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, he had ties to a good family...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……男の為に君は退いたとか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Did you step back for the man?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一服盛った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I poisoned them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええー……」
「だって、うちの家訓は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because our family motto is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汚くとも勝て、だから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Win no matter how dirty it is.'"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女性にはなんやかんやでご退場願った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I got rid of the women somehow or another."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後、私は猛アタックを繰り返し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, I repeatedly made fierce advances,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デートにも行く間柄になってな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we reached the point where we could go on dates...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、どこの馬の骨とも知れぬ剣術女が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But because I was a sword woman of unknown origin,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫌だったのだろう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they probably didn't like it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家の人達は私と彼を離そうとしてきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His family tried to separate him from me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What did you do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一服盛った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I poisoned them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君はすぐに一服盛るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You poison people way too often!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「楽だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because it's easy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、誤解するな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, don't get me wrong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毒と言っても痺れ毒とかで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The poison is like a paralytic, you know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命までは取ってないぞ、あくまで脅しだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not taking lives—it’s just to threaten."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう問題ではなく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's beside the point...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺、君は敵にせんでおく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't make you my enemy."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「らしい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それも昔の話で、今は縁も切れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's from long ago, and now the ties have been cut.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があったかは知らんがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know what happened."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統はJAPANにいたこともあるそうだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I heard the commander was once in JAPAN,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀を使う巫女は見たことなかったろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you never saw a shrine maiden using a sword, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what it means."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、それで終われば良かったんだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it would have been fine if it ended there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が家自体は剣術家として残り続けてな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but my family itself continued on as swordsmen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「母は幼き頃に死去……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My mother died when I was very young...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の私まで父や兄達のもと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even I, a girl, was under my father and brothers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幼き頃より剣術を叩き込まれた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was drilled in swordsmanship from a young age."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「日々、剣術剣術剣術のイカれた家だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was a crazy household obsessed with swordsmanship every single day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、なんかキツそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmm, sounds pretty harsh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、キツかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, it was tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色恋やお洒落とは無縁の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With no connection to romance or fashion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汗と血反吐にまみれる修行の日々――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was days of training soaked in sweat and blood and vomit—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「が、ある日すごく嫌になって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But one day I really got fed up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父も兄も皆殺しにしてやった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I killed my father and brothers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええー……」
「だって、家を出てくと言ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because when I said I was leaving the house,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らの屍を乗り越えろって言うから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they told me to step over our corpses."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、戦いは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, in the fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父と九人の兄対私の十対一だったんだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was my father and nine brothers against me—ten to one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それ、どうやって勝ったんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How did you manage to win that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一服盛った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I poisoned them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええー……」
「だって、うちの家訓は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because our family motto is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汚くとも勝て、だから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Win no matter how dirty it is.'"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝つためならなんでもやりたい放題、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We did whatever we wanted to win,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当、イカれた家だったんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: really, it was a crazy family."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、家を出たはいいが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So it was fine that I left the house, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局剣の道で生きるしかなくてな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in the end, I had no choice but to live by the way of the sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 用心棒として糊口をしのぐ生活だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I lived making ends meet as a bodyguard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなときに出会ったのが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At such a time, I met

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警護対象となった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the person I was assigned to protect,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな商家の息子である今の旦那だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the son of a large merchant family—my current husband."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俗に言う一目惚れでな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was what you'd call love at first sight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は一発で夢中になった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was instantly captivated."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、相手には良家とのご縁が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, he had ties to a good family...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……男の為に君は退いたとか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Did you step back for the man?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一服盛った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I poisoned them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええー……」
「だって、うちの家訓は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because our family motto is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汚くとも勝て、だから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Win no matter how dirty it is.'"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女性にはなんやかんやでご退場願った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I got rid of the women somehow or another."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後、私は猛アタックを繰り返し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, I repeatedly made fierce advances,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デートにも行く間柄になってな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we reached the point where we could go on dates...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、どこの馬の骨とも知れぬ剣術女が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But because I was a sword woman of unknown origin,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫌だったのだろう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they probably didn't like it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家の人達は私と彼を離そうとしてきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His family tried to separate him from me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What did you do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一服盛った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I poisoned them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君はすぐに一服盛るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You poison people way too often!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「楽だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because it's easy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、誤解するな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, don't get me wrong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毒と言っても痺れ毒とかで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The poison is like a paralytic, you know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命までは取ってないぞ、あくまで脅しだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not taking lives—it’s just to threaten."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう問題ではなく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's beside the point...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺、君は敵にせんでおく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't make you my enemy."
